intro.value: You pull up to the driveway of the family holiday home and park the car. It's dark, but it's as idyllic as you remember from all that time ago. You remember being told to look in the glovebox before going in. It's good to be back.

response.value: It's a nice clean car. Not much to see, but there is a glove box.
The glove box is closed but appears to be unlocked.
Inside is a key, and a handwritten note from Dad. You take both.

The note is from your Dad and reads: Hi Son, home you enjoy your break. You'll need to fire up the generator around back to get power and lights on. Also, found something in the attic for you - it's in your room... enjoy!
